full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Second Language Training for Foreign Service Officers (/reference 30360)

### Notice Details
* Tender Reference: cb-297-68652636
* Amendment: 9 ( Solicitation Number CIC-156707)
* Publication Date: 25 January 2024
* Tender Closing: 23 February 2024 (14:00:00 EST)
* Amendment Date: 23 February 2024

### Tender Overview
Immigration, Refugee's and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) International Network requires in-person Second Language Training for Foreign Service Officers (FSO). The program aims to provide learners with a C/C/C reading, writing, and oral language profile to meet the requirements of employment.

### Tender Specifications
* Streams: Two - full-time group training and full-time individual training
* Languages: French and English
* Hours: Up to 2270 hours of Second Language Training per learner
* Training Structure: Structured to provide "as and when requested" training to FSOs

### Qatar/ Engagement Methods
The contract notice is open to all interested bidders. This is a Competitive - Open Bidding process. Tenders will be evaluated on the basis of the lowest price.

### Accommodations and Accessibility
No accommodations or special accessibility requirements are noted in this request.

### Trade and Financial Attachments
The following attachments are available for download.
